name: The Artifact Hunter (DCJam2021 Version)
description:
The Artifact Hunter is a 3D Dungeon Crawler that follows the adventures of Tara West, the daughter of a treasure hunter finishing her father's last, incomplete quest - only to be led into a much more intriguing mystery.

Unfortunately the game was not completed in time. While the environments and core mechanics are all complete (with the occasional bug), we did not have time to thread the puzzles and mechanics throughout or world - making normal progression impossible.

To counter this we have left a secret room in the first area - "The Manor". If you can find the secret room - it will provide access to all of the levels of the game!

CREDITS:

  • Gameplay & Direction: Adam Bourke
  • Artwork: Leo Crampton Dazzara
  • Original Music: Charlotte McMillan
  • Voice Actors (though Fiverr.com):
    • Sararose Willey (SararoseVA)
    • Sam Cole (SamColeOfficial)
    • Austin K.J. Rose (Akrvo)
  • + Many Additional Free/Paid Asset Creators Credited In-Game
